channel.title: Compiler error help!
channel.description:
okay! i need help when i compile i get a error that says
'client.java:38455: 'class' or 'interface' expected if <playerRights < 1>//items normal players can not use ^ 1 error exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server press any key to continue....'
that was the error whats it mean?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 05:38:36 PM[/size][hr]anyone!?!?!?!?!? and javaisnotrecgonized i know your out there so post wdf this means!

item.title: Compiler error help!
item.dc:creator: @adrian_cruz adrian cruz
item.description:
@adrian_cruz wrote:

ye he coded something wrong that brings that up… advice(u should open 2 of the save thing ur editing in incase u make a error and forgot were to erase it…, that way u have the other and just save it…)

all u have is little error

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error help!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

No, he has a problem in the file that the compiler is trying to compile.

He just is too retarded to understand it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error help!
item.dc:creator: @adrian_cruz adrian cruz
item.description:
@adrian_cruz wrote:

the reason ur getting that error is cuz uve coded something wrong that broguth that error

and the thing that says no javac is because you have to right click and click edit(once u extract to desktop in folder)

edit this, dont change anything…

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -
cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe”
server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error help!
item.dc:creator: @x_m4gickz_x x m4gickz x
item.description:
@x_m4gickz_x wrote:

im just testing my compiler seeing if it works and i got that error.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 06:17:23 PM[/size][hr]the only thing i eddited was my compiler.bat and runeserver.bat[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 06:18:18 PM[/size][hr]@echo off
title r0arscape
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

@echo off
title r0arscape
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

thats all i edited

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 06:19:34 PM[/size][hr]java do ya know whats wrong?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 06:24:25 PM[/size][hr]java pweez!

Read full topic
